contents: Ability to handle common vulnerabilities

experience.subtitle: Zhejiang University NGICS Platform
contents: A research oriented role at Zhejiang University NGICS Platform under the College of Control Science and Engineering.
Investigating the behaviors behind mainstream DCS (Distributed Control System) and PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) with the aid of Protocol Analysis and Reverse Engineering
From security perspective, discover potential attacks which can cause harm to the system.
Build real-case scenario to demonstrate attacks in order to raise awareness.

Cleaned the data and used the JS third-party library (echarts.js) to draw different types of charts on the data to provide data basis for information search
